name: Cat Trick
description:
Known bug: Occasionally the cat will get stuck in the "pounce" state and won't move.

(Also, since some people were having trouble, click on the check mark box after you select your cat to start the game)

Welcome to Cat Trick sports arena! Lure the cats into jumping and flipping for max airtime points, but don't let them catch the feather! Different cats have different behaviors so you'll have to figure out what makes each cat interested and what makes them pounce.

Made for AI Jam and as a special gift for my friend, Ben Miller.

Credits:
Design - Lisa Brown

Art and Voice - Will White

Rope Physics - Jakub Koziol

Music -
